mil5.2.5:2.2: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattakappe → gaṇanapathavītivattakappe (bj); gaṇanāpathaṃ vītivatte na kappe (maku) | tassa kusalassa balavegaṃ → taṃ kusalabalavegavipphāraṃ (bj); taṃ akusalavegavipphārena (maku); taṃ kusalaṃ balavegavihāraṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
mil5.2.5:3.1: pure tava rājā daṇḍaṃ dhāressatī’ti → mā te rājā daṇḍaṃ pāpeyyāti (bj, maku)
